g.text: Is redirected to the Onboarding Solution (unauthenticated)
Strong identitiy verification (eg. through a national ID provider)
- Create the PDF contract file (for all products)
- Create a signing package at Document Signing Solution
- Redirect Document Signing Solution to sign the package
- User signs the package with strong authentication
- Allow user to download the PDF (optional)
- Store the PDF in the digital archive
- If one contract for all products, status = ACTIVE
- If one contract per product, status = WAITING_FOR_SIGNATURE
- If IdP is managed by InvestSuite, add ?create_idp_user=true
Store the ivs_user_id in the middleware for future use
User is redirected to the Onboarding Solution (authenticated)
we recommend to skip the PAPER_MONEY portfolios
The event does not contain detail about the portfolio created other than the ID
To get the details, issue a GET /portfolios/{id}
[If one contract per product and contract is not signed]
